title: Inline monitoring for Cloud apps - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: Here are some widely used real world use cases that will address your organizationâ€™s monitoring of cloud apps via Inline. Use Case # Category Use Case Description 1 Inline monitoring of Cloud app We would like to apply policies based on AD users, groups or OU 2 Inline monitoring of Cloud app We would like to apply policies based on the source of traffic 3 Inline monitoring of Cloud app We would like to apply policies based on the source of traffic, trusted or untrusted networks 4 Inline monitoring of Cloud app We would like to apply policies based on the source of traffic, forward or reverse proxy 5 Inline monitoring of Cloud app We would like to apply policies based on the application instance 6 Inline monitoring of Cloud app We would like to apply policies based on the constraint profile 7 Inline monitoring of Cloud app We would like to apply policies to enforce step up authentication as required
